trans-unit.source: Subscription Description
trans-unit.target: Subscription Description

trans-unit.source: The subscription description is an XML <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> document that defines the desired semantics for a subscription.
trans-unit.target: The subscription description is an XML <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> document that defines the desired semantics for a subscription.

trans-unit.source: Subscription Description Properties
trans-unit.target: Subscription Description Properties

trans-unit.source: The subscription description contains the following properties.
trans-unit.target: The subscription description contains the following properties.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> the <externalLink><linkText>SubscriptionDescription Properties</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription_properties.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> topic.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> the <externalLink><linkText>SubscriptionDescription Properties</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription_properties.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> topic.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>LockDuration</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.lockduration.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>XML datetime</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>LockDuration</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.lockduration.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>XML datetime</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: The default lock duration is applied to subscriptions that do not define a lock duration:
trans-unit.target: The default lock duration is applied to subscriptions that do not define a lock duration:

trans-unit.source: Range: 0 – 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Range: 0 – 5 minutes.

trans-unit.source: 0 means that the message is not locked.
trans-unit.target: 0 means that the message is not locked.

trans-unit.source: Default: 30 seconds
trans-unit.target: Default: 30 seconds

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>RequiresSession</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.requiressession.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>RequiresSession</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.requiressession.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: You can only set this property at subscription creation time.
trans-unit.target: You can only set this property at subscription creation time.

trans-unit.source: If set to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, the subscription will be session-aware and only <languageKeyword>SessionReceiver</languageKeyword> will be supported.
trans-unit.target: If set to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, the subscription will be session-aware and only <languageKeyword>SessionReceiver</languageKeyword> will be supported.

trans-unit.source: Session-aware subscriptions are not supported through REST.
trans-unit.target: Session-aware subscriptions are not supported through REST.

trans-unit.source: Default: <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Default: <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>DefaultMessageTimeToLive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.defaultmessagetimetolive.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>PTnHnMnS</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>DefaultMessageTimeToLive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.defaultmessagetimetolive.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>PTnHnMnS</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Determines how long a message lives in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Determines how long a message lives in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Based on whether dead-lettering is enabled, a message whose <newTerm>Time To Live</newTerm> (TTL) has expired is either moved to the subscription’s associated <languageKeyword>DeadLetterQueue</languageKeyword>, or permanently deleted.
trans-unit.target: Based on whether dead-lettering is enabled, a message whose <newTerm>Time To Live</newTerm> (TTL) has expired is either moved to the subscription’s associated <languageKeyword>DeadLetterQueue</languageKeyword>, or permanently deleted.

trans-unit.source: If the topic specifies a smaller TTL than the subscription, the topic TTL is applied.
trans-unit.target: If the topic specifies a smaller TTL than the subscription, the topic TTL is applied.

trans-unit.source: Range: 1 second – TimeSpan.MaxValue
trans-unit.target: Range: 1 second – TimeSpan.MaxValue

trans-unit.source: Default: TimeSpan.MaxValue
trans-unit.target: Default: TimeSpan.MaxValue

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>DeadLetteringOnMessageExpiration</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.enabledeadletteringonmessageexpiration.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>DeadLetteringOnMessageExpiration</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.enabledeadletteringonmessageexpiration.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: This field controls how <token>sb2</token> handles a message with an expired TTL.
trans-unit.target: This field controls how <token>sb2</token> handles a message with an expired TTL.

trans-unit.source: If it is enabled and a message expires, <token>sb2</token> moves the message from the queue into the subscription’s dead-letter sub-queue.
trans-unit.target: If it is enabled and a message expires, <token>sb2</token> moves the message from the queue into the subscription’s dead-letter sub-queue.

trans-unit.source: If disabled, message is permanently deleted from the subscription’s main queue.
trans-unit.target: If disabled, message is permanently deleted from the subscription’s main queue.

trans-unit.source: Settable only at subscription creation time.
trans-unit.target: Settable only at subscription creation time.

trans-unit.source: Default: <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Default: <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>DeadLetteringOnFilterEvaluationExceptions</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.enabledeadletteringonfilterevaluationexceptions.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>DeadLetteringOnFilterEvaluationExceptions</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.subscriptiondescription.enabledeadletteringonfilterevaluationexceptions.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Determines how <token>sb2</token> handles a message that causes an exception during a subscription’s filter evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Determines how <token>sb2</token> handles a message that causes an exception during a subscription’s filter evaluation.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, the message that caused the exception is moved to the subscription’s dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: If the value is set to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, the message that caused the exception is moved to the subscription’s dead-letter queue.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, it is discarded.

trans-unit.source: By default, this parameter is set to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, enabling you to investigate the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: By default, this parameter is set to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, enabling you to investigate the cause of the exception.

trans-unit.source: It can occur from a malformed message or some incorrect assumptions being made in the filter about the form of the message.
trans-unit.target: It can occur from a malformed message or some incorrect assumptions being made in the filter about the form of the message.

trans-unit.source: Settable only at subscription creation time.
trans-unit.target: Settable only at subscription creation time.

trans-unit.source: Default: <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Default: <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: EnableBatchedOperations
trans-unit.target: EnableBatchedOperations

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables service-side batching behavior when performing operations for the specific queue.
trans-unit.target: Enables or disables service-side batching behavior when performing operations for the specific queue.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, <token>sb2</token> will collect/batch multiple operations to the backend to be more connection efficient.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, <token>sb2</token> will collect/batch multiple operations to the backend to be more connection efficient.

trans-unit.source: If you want lower operation latency, then you can disable this feature.
trans-unit.target: If you want lower operation latency, then you can disable this feature.

trans-unit.source: ForwardTo
trans-unit.target: ForwardTo

trans-unit.source: The path to the recipient to which the message is forwarded.
trans-unit.target: The path to the recipient to which the message is forwarded.

trans-unit.source: MaxDeliveryCount
trans-unit.target: MaxDeliveryCount

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times <token>sb2</token> tries to deliver a message before that message is dead lettered or discarded.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of times <token>sb2</token> tries to deliver a message before that message is dead lettered or discarded.

trans-unit.source: MessageCount
trans-unit.target: MessageCount

trans-unit.source: Reports the number of messages in the queue as reported by the monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: Reports the number of messages in the queue as reported by the monitoring system.

trans-unit.source: IsAnonymousAccessible
trans-unit.target: IsAnonymousAccessible

trans-unit.source: Gets whether anonymous access is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Gets whether anonymous access is allowed.

trans-unit.source: AuthorizationRules
trans-unit.target: AuthorizationRules

trans-unit.source: Gets the authorization rules for the description.
trans-unit.target: Gets the authorization rules for the description.

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current status of the subscription (enabled or disabled).
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets the current status of the subscription (enabled or disabled).

trans-unit.source: When a subscription is disabled, that subscription cannot send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: When a subscription is disabled, that subscription cannot send or receive messages.

trans-unit.source: SupportOrdering
trans-unit.target: SupportOrdering

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the subscription supports ordering.
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets whether the subscription supports ordering.

trans-unit.source: Here are some things you can do with this API
trans-unit.target: Here are some things you can do with this API

trans-unit.target: List all subscriptions under a given path:

trans-unit.target: List all subscriptions updated in the last 5 minutes:

trans-unit.target: List all subscriptions having at least one message:
